content:
Hello, I've been using rust-analyzer via coc-rust-analyzer and have a project that uses vendor'd sources.

Is there a way to exclude the symbols from the vendors in the "CocList -I symbols" command?
BTW, really really enjoying RA. Fantastic work!
More info: It seems to be pulling the symbols from the vendor directory which is outside the workspace folder, but still inside the git structure.

Structure:
/root
/root/game_client (Godot)
/root/server/vendor (cargo vendor'd dir)
/root/server/project (cargo workspace root)

In the CocConfig:
"coc.preferences.rootPatterns": [".git", "Cargo.toml"],
"coc.preferences.ignoredRootPaths": ["/root"],
"rust-analyzer.excludeGlobs": ["/root/server/vendor/*"]
Anybody know where a good place to get help for the above issue would be? ^^
The #t-compiler/wg-rls-2.0 stream would be the best place to ask
